tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am fortunate to be one of Dr. Prakash Kinis patients. He is the fourth doctor we saw on our journey to becoming parents.. and we decided there is no fifth!  Despite the unusual circumstances of going through(I had 3 miscarriages before my Son happened) , he made me feel at ease for the entire length of my pregnancy and delivery.
He initially took a thorough look at my heavy, thick medical record(with all that miscarriage history and numerous tests done to us) that I had brought with me from the other hospitals. Primarily, Dr. Kini took his time and spoke to us in depth. I was at peace because I noticed he was trying to take one step at a time and taking everything into a different perspective than what I was told before.   I immediately started feeling very comfortable and confident after a long time of being distressed about possible negative outcomes of my conversations with any other doctors.  I was not scared this time at all..Thanks to his insight and care, I cannot imagine a more supportive, brilliant OBG and Cloudnine is lucky to have him at the helm. 
All he told us was, forget about the past and soon you are going to be parents!! All he feeds into your head is positivity. He never treated mine as a special case, no extra scans, no extra medicines, no extra tests. he is soo confident that his touch(experience) tells him everything and doesnot require a scan so often .
His bedside manner made me feel no longer a patient, he answers all the questions himself without even asking for it.. In each visit he mentions stay positive and enjoy your pregnancy at least a 10 times..
I had PIH started from 31nd week ,  again his mantra is only to stay calm and take rest.. because of increasing BP In 35th week I had to get an emergency Csec for which we weren’t prepared!! And guess what, his magical hands jus gave us what we were praying for- A Healthy Baby!!!
Without a second thought I recommend Dr Kini to anyone who is looking for a hassle free Pregnancy till Delivery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
On this doctor's day, i would like to express my heartfelt gratitude to Dr Prakash Kini. We do not have enough words to tell the way he has handled our case.
He diagnoses the problem perfectly and tells clearly on what must be done. He doesn't prescribe unnecessary medicines or scans, but he insists us to stay happy, calm and positive.
The very line which always resonates and has helped me the most even now is "Stop worrying and Start living". I can never forget this line. Every visit with him was bringing us so much positivity and i thoroughly enjoyed both my pregnancies and gave birth to two lovely kids. His methods are too good specially post C section, I was able to walk on my own the very same day feeding my little one with a happy face, I could return to walking, swimming etc in just a few days after my C section. The best part is the way he involves the husband in the entire process from the start, I feel that is extremely important which brings a big support and with all these there will be no question of postpartum depression. We are too lucky and fortunate to have him as a doctor and again we just can't thank him enough.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Had got quite a big fibroid removed by Dr.Prakash Kini about 12 years ago. Had consulted other doctors before this who said that since it was a big intrauterine fibroid, the uterus itself needs to be removed.  Was quite young with only one 2 year old then. Checked with at least 3 doctors; 2 whom said that it was not possible, one said that she can do it but I need to remain in bed rest at the hospital for  a month. Was not satisfied with this. Then came to  Dr.Kini and never went anywhere else after that. He did the fibroid removal with expert ease; no discomfort of any kind during or after surgery. Was up and about,  ready for a marathon in few hours with no surgery marks as well. Completely trustworthy doctor to whose expertise one can just submit oneself.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My mother got her hysterectomy done 2 days ago and I don't believe there is anyone on this earth who could have done a better job.She is a very difficult and anxious patient and I was so impressed with Dr .Kini.You can see his experience and skillmanship speak for itself.He is so detailed and will leave no stone unturned to ensure the best for his patients.The confidence with which he speaks is so tremendously reassuring.No unnecessary medications prescribed and my mum was up and about and about in a days time.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review: I had a troubling experience with this doctor. Despite my continuous bleeding for over a month, he refused to prescribe medication. Instead, he suggested I undergo bariatric surgery and referred me to a doctor at Fortis. Additionally, he told my spouse that I likely had cardiovascular issues and wouldn't be able to climb a flight of stairs, urging immediate surgery. ** **** **** ** *** ********** ** ************** ********* ** **** *** ******** Furthermore, after delivery, he referred me to an external pediatric doctor instead of the in-house Cloud 9 doctor.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: Bitter experience..he is a little opinionated and thinks girls are born to give birth..he doesn't respect the patient's plan and also suggests to get random test done (from a disgusting place named LUCID,dont go there u will end up getting hurt).my usg was done from another place but he asked to get it done again from cloud9,which gave the same conclusion.he even charges 300₹ for follow up within 5days..i went within 5days and the doctor was on vacation for the next 2days,ended up paying the full consultation fee.pls don't visit,very demotivating doctor

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: Dr. Prakash Kini is a well experienced and perfectionist in his field. He made my second pregnancy a happy and comfortable journey with his advice and assurance. I was Soo relaxed throughout my pregnancy, thanks to Dr. Prakash Kini. He gives you the right advice which is required and no unnecessary extra information. Just right information which you require for your pregnancy. The c section operation was as smooth as he had described and in the evening (after 4-5 hours of operation) I was able to walk. Thank you very much Doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I was forced to review the hospital while getting discharged by the staff. Hence initially I just entered 5 stars.
But the actual story is..I underwent hysterectomy here by one of the **** doctor as I was told.
From day 2 I complained of pain,fever n discharge from the surgery area, *** ** *********** *** ***** **** *** ** Unfortunately by then I had developed a major infection, but was given antibiotics which was resistant to the bacteria and has taken me 2 months almost to come out of the infection.

I was told that I didn't heal coz i was not active  and finally I visited another doctor ** ***** *** ***** * *** ***** ****** **** ******** *********** *** ***** **** ***** ***** * **** ******* ***  * *** ********* * ***** ***** ** *** ***** ***** * ********* * *** ********* *** *** ** *** ********** ********* **** ****** *** spending thousands and thousands of rupees costed me a huge loss of ******* money, previous time and mental peace.
Everyone please read carefully and then think of going to this hospital.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: He is very good doctor who unnecessarily does not prescribe medicines .. he is very cool and very experienced doctor which is seen from his check-ups .He will never allow you to panic in pregnancy and hence you can enjoy this beautiful phase of your life .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I am very much happy that I met Prakash sir, I have contacted so many hospital and doctor for this issue took so many treatments, medisions but failed in every where. Finally by go Grace I met and took treatments *** ****** * ****** ** ****** ********* * ** ******** ***** ****** ****
I am very much thankful to Prakash sir.
Doctor is well treated and guided.

review: Won't be visiting this rude person again. In our first appointment he made us wait from 4.50 pm to 6 p.m. and when we were late for our second appointment he had left the premises already. So my wife called him and he gave an unnecessary rant about why she called him and whether we think that he doesn't have a personal life. Thoroughly unprofessional *** * *****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Build a hope where there was no hope with our issue where suffering with. We are hoping for the best in coming days. My wife is really sensitive and in a whole as a couple are already emotional what we are going through but by consulting Him we got that confidence to fight back the situation.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review:
He is very patient and carries a listening ear . His impeccable cooperation and kindness makes you comfortable to put down what's your problem.

I was happy though unfortunately I couldn't continue my treatment at his clinic due to my own reasons ..

But still after meeting him I felt he is very informative and factual ..

Thank you Dr sahab for your honesty and instructional way of dealing with patients ..

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: The way he speaks to my wife while taking the details are not all in a fair way. ****** ********* ***** * Govt hospital doctors are far better in treating patients. We highly hurt the way he treated us. Please note : my wife's first pregnancy was with Cloudnine only but different doctor. I can't comment on his skill, because we are not into that level of interaction.

tags: None
review: With Dr. Kini lists are redundant. He pre-emptively answers questions and has a brute force way of keeping you positive as against doctors who may approach pregnancies with counsel/empathy, etc. If you are likely to have a c-section, he's your best bet as a surgeon.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor gives very comfert zone to patients to discuss their doubts and he explains each and everything about concern how it's happened, why it wil happen and what need to be taken care for the next. He takes very good initiative to guide patients very well. One of my friends suggested about  doctor Kini. Really nice very good exeperianced doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: It's amazing ..... he gave us confidence and help us to overcome with our previous issues..... speaks straight no round talks......best best best....my advice to those who are anxious to conceive....only one place with one miracle doctor...Dr.Prakash Kini....

tags: None
review: Excellent and no nonsense doctor. Practical and realistic. Not emotional. He identifies the cause *** ******** **** *** ******** ********** Don't expect sympathy and long discussions with him. He gets to the point right away and make things crystal clear. No repetitions. You need to have lots of patience and listen to him. *** *** ** **** ***** *** things will be just fine.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: *** ******* **** ** *** *** ** *** ****** ************* * **** **** **** The confidence in his treatment , the positivity in his approach is so over whelming. I delivered twin boys with the help of Dr. Prakash Kini - with absolutely no medicines and the least number of scans! Dr. Kini makes c - section deliver seem like normal , perhaps even simpler than normal delivery. Thank you Dr.kini you truly are a gem!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
****** *** ******* **** ** *** ******* ******* Recently I had surgery by Doctor Prakash Kini.  Really it's amazing.  The usage of Technology towards his patients are  excellent. He is very friendly. 

Kudos to Him. 

My Namaskaras to Dr. Prakash Kini.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: From my own experience with Dr. Prakash Kini and the staff at Cloudnine, I have no other words than a very big THANK YOU for their great work! As a professional Dr. Prakash Kini is as great as the doctors in the UK can be, and even more. Also, I wish God bestow him with good health to allow him to keep up with his workloads, and I wish him all the happiness in the World!

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review:
He made me to see pregnancy in a whole new glass.Minimal medicine.His prenatal classes were insightful.Clarifies the queries if you have any.Most of the time he can read your mind before you start posting the query.
Hardly spent 5 mins for each checkup but will be confident when i step out of his cabin.Kind words to trust mother nature for delivery mode encouraged me for the final D day.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr. Prakash Kini is very practical doctor. He will probably come across rude and insensitive but he is infact preparing you to deal with challenges. His favourite sentence to me was ‘enjoy your pregnancy’ through all the pain and discomfort. And eventually even when I was in labor I did not panic telling myself ‘it’s normal’ I need to ‘enjoy my pregnancy’. 

Had a quick labour (2hours only) and a normal delivery! A big thank you to Dr. Kini 😌

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr is really good but had a bad experience with the staff at Cloudnine jayanagar. The lady staff who was incharge of letting the patients in was very unprofessional. She ll say who is the next patient but let some other patient who came after us n then when we asked her she complained to the dr. N dr. Called us in n says they came 5 mins earlier where as the lady says they had arrived an hour early..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Met him for a brief second consultation. I honestly do not know what frustrates him but he literally shouted at me for every question I asked. Then he did the below:

1. Said he knows how to run the department. * *** ***** ** *****
2. Asked me why I was concerned about my health. ( Well, you know, it is this little thing, I want to be healthy, if you give me your kind permission, doctor) 
3. Told he has 2 kids and what he can do* **** **** ****** *************
I believe the outburst by the doctor says a lot about the hospital management or mismanagement if I may say so. Patients do not need to be shouted at. I literally had to control my tears while I tried to finish the horror consultation.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I was consulting Dr Prakash Kinni in Cloud nine  Jay nagar, branch for my regular pregnancy check up.As I heard that Doctor Kinni is highly experienced, I was happy on my decision . But after few consultation, I found that Doctor was not patient friendly, he was not spending not even 5 mins time , to discuss on health issues, to answer any related questions.Instead his responses were rude sometimes.Unwillingly  I did my complete pregnancy check up , but decided to change the doctor for delivery and visited other hospital as I was loosing my hope.It was a bad experience.I will never suggest any one to visit this doctor.

tags: None
review:
** ** *** **** ****** ***** I consulted him before my first pregnancy after trying for three years and three failed IUI attempts. He asked me to get some test done and then mentioned that everything is fine with me and my husband, we should just try naturally and that within 6 months I will be pregnant. I got pregnant within 2 months naturally :). Entire pregnancy was smooth, no restrictions on diets, exercise or outings. Delivery was even smoother, started walking 3 hours after c-section and when I left hospital after two days I was up and running. No unnecessary test and scans. 

Just found out that I am pregnant again.. and didnt even want to think about any other doctor.. even If I have to drive 30 Kms to other part of Bangalore.. it will still be Dr. Prakash Kini. In my opinion, he is the best doctor ever. All you need to do is listen carefully to what he says. Like the fact that he is a fitness enthusiast and a Doctor you can talk about everything to.

tags: None
review: we been trying for kids for more then 4 years and we consult doctor for suggestions and we hear the same thing of waiting and putting everything on nature is not we expect.. anybody can say to wait and say nature should co-operate and we dont need experts to say this i dont have to pay soo much here this..

review: Visited the Dr for my wife. we were consulting a different gynac for pregnancy but were not comfortable and hence decided to visit Dr Prakash Kini(one of our cousin had her delivery done by Dr Prakash Kini) . he was very soft spoken, gave ample amount of time and clearly explained the process.

tags: None
review: I am going to Dr kini for almost 25 years and every time I go to him it is a pleasure. Whatever be the issue few minutes with him brings a great amount of reassurance.. His command on his subject and handling of his patients is exemplary. This time it was no different. I am happy that we have access to him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
** ** *** **** ** *** ****** * **** ***** He is very precise and gives satisfactory explanation for all the queries i had. He gave so much motivation and  positive vibes to enjoy my pregnancy period every time i saw him. Am very thankful to him that he handled my case so well and now am a mother of my healthy son. His treatment is pretty simple and doesnt prescribe unnecessary medications or tests.

Am happy that i consulted him and would recommend him for sure.

tags: None
review: I delivered my baby last year with Prakash kini. ** ** *** ** *** **** ****** ** ********** After consulting multiple doctor's during my pregnancy, I finally went to Dr kini and it was the best decision. Though he had to perform c section because of some complications I had. He waited till 40th week to happen naturally. I would certainly recommend him .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: ** ** *** **** ******  * **** **** ******  **** ***** he makes you very comfortable and boosts your confidence. He made my pregnancy journeyvery special for me and my husband,  and with God's blessings and Dr Prakash Kini 's help we are blessed  with wonderful  baby girl. My visit to cloudnine  hospital is only for Dr Prakash Kini and the management  and staffof cloudnine hospital.  Thank you Dr Prakash Kini.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,

He was recommended to me by my best friend and I will totally recommend him to everyone .Even though I had to go from one end of the city to another - it was totally worth it .

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,

tags: Value for money,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,

Regards 
Bharathi pillai
